title: Remake counts as a game in rank?
body: I was about to play a rank game when it wouldn't load, now this isn't the first time so alt-tab and close the game to change my firewall settings, i messed up in the process and reopened the game before i can change my firewall so i had to alt-tab again. Finished with the firewall process and proceeded to open the game but it popped a message saying the game is over and brought me to the after match review, I checked my profile to see my final placements were set in, i'm just confused because i never thought remakes counted as a game especially in rank.

replies.body:
As others have mentioned here in the reply section, a remake **does count** if you were the one to cause the remake. The penalty for causing a remake in a ranked match his LP loss for the match and the match counting as a *loss* on your record, even if it was a promo series. You can find more details on how the remake system works in our [**/Remake FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686--Remake-FAQ).

Let me know if you have any questions.

What if
You were auto filled as support? Does it count as you playing support? Or can you get filled again right away
If you left or were disconnected from the match when the remake happened, then the match counts as a loss for you.
I believe if you were the person to cause the remake it counts as if you left the game.
